moves.description: Create ConfigService with validation methods and interface
moves.details: Create the ConfigService class with validation methods for game, season, and channel settings. Implement dependency injection pattern for DatabaseService, similar to GameCreationService.
Add methods to ConfigService for interacting with the database for all configuration types
Modify ConfigCommand to use the new ConfigService instead of direct database access
Write comprehensive unit tests for ConfigService validation and database interaction methods
Final cleanup, documentation, and any necessary adjustments
